node.statement: Prove the forward direction of the O-Slice Connectivity Theorem. Assume X is O-slice >= n. Fix H in F_O. By hypothesis, [G_+ smash_H S^{m*rho_H}, X]^G = 0 for all m with m|H| < n. By the Wirthmuller isomorphism, this equals pi_{m*rho_H}^H(X) = 0 for m < n/|H|. Using the isotropy separation cofiber sequence and induction on |H| (descending), show that the vanishing of these RO(H)-graded homotopy groups implies pi_k(Phi^H(X)) = 0 for k < floor(n/|H|).
